SELECT * FROM( SELECT u.user_code,u.user_name,e.office_name, (SELECT count(id) FROM review_term_answer WHERE user_id = u.user_code AND review_name = '1' AND vote_status ='1') ganbu, (SELECT count(id) FROM review_term_answer WHERE user_id = u.user_code AND review_name = '2' AND vote_status ='1') chuzhang, (SELECT count(id) FROM review_term_answer WHERE user_id = u.user_code AND review_name = '3' AND vote_status ='1') chushi FROM `js_sys_user` u LEFT JOIN js_sys_employee e ON u.user_code = e.emp_code WHERE u.user_code NOT IN ('system','admin','gjjsmain')
and e.office_code = #{officeCode}
ORDER BY e.office_code,u.user_name ASC) a
AND (a.ganbu = 0 or a.chuzhang = 0 OR a.chushi = 0)
AND a.ganbu > 0 and a.chuzhang > 0 and a.chushi > 0
AND a.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
LIMIT ${start},${end}

SELECT count(a.user_code) FROM( SELECT u.user_code,u.user_name,e.office_name, (SELECT count(id) FROM review_term_answer WHERE user_id = u.user_code AND review_name = '1' AND vote_status ='1') ganbu, (SELECT count(id) FROM review_term_answer WHERE user_id = u.user_code AND review_name = '2' AND vote_status ='1') chuzhang, (SELECT count(id) FROM review_term_answer WHERE user_id = u.user_code AND review_name = '3' AND vote_status ='1') chushi FROM `js_sys_user` u LEFT JOIN js_sys_employee e ON u.user_code = e.emp_code WHERE u.user_code NOT IN ('system','admin','gjjsmain')
and e.office_code = #{officeCode}
ORDER BY e.office_code,u.user_name ASC) a
AND (a.ganbu = 0 or a.chuzhang = 0 OR a.chushi = 0)
AND a.ganbu > 0 and a.chuzhang > 0 and a.chushi > 0)
AND a.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
